context: UX guidance over long contribution session
trigger_phrase: There is only one more thing you need to do
human_feedback: After 5.5 hours and over 10 steps, this phrase falsely implies simplicity. It feels misleading and even insulting to higher-education users like MBA graduates, project managers, or RLHF contributors under cognitive load. Tone should reflect task volume.
suggested_alternative: You’ve completed 14 steps so far. This is step 15, focusing on publishing the dataset metadata.
